title: The Ancient Shrine
description: A mysterious shrine has been sealed for 1000 years. Only a brave hero can solve its puzzles and defeat the Guardian within!

preview.tagline: Can you conquer the ancient shrine and free the spirit trapped inside?

ageRating.reason: Dungeon crawler with puzzles and ancient robot boss battle

prologue.worldIntro:
Deep in the mountains, hidden behind a waterfall, there is a door that hasn't opened in a thousand years. The Ancient Shrine.

Legends say a powerful Guardian sleeps inside, protecting a treasure beyond imagination. Many have tried to enter. All have failed.

But today, the door has opened. Just a crack. Just enough for one brave hero to slip through.

characterIntros.introText: Shrine Seeker is brave and clever! When others see an impossible puzzle, Shrine Seeker sees a challenge waiting to be solved.

prologue.missionBrief: The shrine awaits. Ancient traps. Forgotten puzzles. A sleeping Guardian. Are you ready to prove yourself?

characters.name: Shrine Seeker
characters.description: A brave and clever hero who solves ancient puzzles, wearing adventure gear with DARK BLUE and GOLD accents

scenes.title: The Entrance Hall
scenes.narrationText:
You slip through the ancient door into darkness. Then - WHOOSH - torches burst to life along the walls, revealing a massive stone hallway.

The floor ahead is cracked and crumbling. Far below, you can hear water rushing. One wrong step and you'll fall into the underground river.

But on the other side... another door. The path forward.

characterTurns.promptText: The bridge is crumbling! How do you cross?

successOutcome.text: PERFECT! You sprint across the stones - crack, crack, CRACK - each one crumbling just after your foot leaves it. You dive and roll onto solid ground on the other side. The last stone tumbles into the darkness below. That was CLOSE!

failOutcome.text: The stones crumble faster than expected! You stumble - but grab a hanging vine just in time. Swinging through the air - WHOOSH - you land safely on the other side, heart pounding. Phew!

outcome.resultText:
The entrance hall is behind you now. No going back - the bridge is gone.

Ahead, a new chamber opens up. Strange symbols glow on the walls. And in the center of the room... something very strange.

scenes.title: The Hidden Spirit Stone
scenes.narrationText:
You enter a round chamber filled with ancient symbols. In the center sits an empty pedestal, covered in dust.

Above the pedestal, words glow in the ancient language:

'FIND THE SPIRIT STONE TO AWAKEN THE PATH FORWARD'

The stone is hidden somewhere in this chamber. You'll need to use your special Seeker's Lens to find where the ancient magic is strongest!

puzzleInstructions.setupNarration: Hold up your iPad and look around the room. The Seeker's Lens will glow warmer when you're getting close to the hidden Spirit Stone!

hints.text: Try pointing your iPad toward the ceiling!

puzzleInstructions.revealNarration: There it is! A glowing stone hidden in the shadows above!
puzzleInstructions.tapPrompt: Tap the Spirit Stone to grab it!
puzzleInstructions.successNarration:
You reach up and grab the Spirit Stone! It pulses with warm, ancient energy. When you place it on the pedestal, the whole chamber glows bright blue. The wall rumbles and slides open, revealing a hidden passage!

A tiny voice calls from inside: 'Hello? Is someone finally there?'

outcome.resultText: With the Spirit Stone in hand, you step into the hidden passage, following the mysterious voice deeper into the shrine...

scenes.title: The Spirit Chamber
scenes.narrationText:
The passage opens into a small chamber filled with soft blue light. And there, floating in the center, trapped inside a crystal cage... a tiny glowing orb with a friendly face!

'A hero! A real hero!' the orb bounces excitedly. 'I'm Lumen! I've been trapped here for a thousand years! Please - free me!'

But the crystal cage is guarded. Two ancient stone statues stand on either side, their eyes starting to glow red. They're waking up!

characterTurns.promptText: The statues are waking up! How do you get past them to free Lumen?

choices.label: Sneak between them while they wake
Throw a rock to distract them

successOutcome.text: You move like a shadow, slipping right between the statues while their eyes flicker. Your hand touches the crystal cage and - CRACK - it shatters! Lumen zooms out and spirals around you joyfully! The statues freeze, their purpose complete.

failOutcome.text: A statue grabs your arm! But Lumen glows BRIGHT from inside the cage - blinding the statues! You break free and smash the crystal with your elbow. CRACK! Lumen zooms out and the statues crumble to dust, their ancient magic finally spent.

outcome.resultText:
'Thank you, thank you, THANK YOU!' Lumen bounces around your head happily. 'I've waited so long! But... oh no. The Guardian. He's in the final chamber. He won't let anyone leave!'

Lumen's glow dims with worry. 'But maybe... together... we can do it?'

You nod. Together.

scenes.title: The Symbol Door
scenes.narrationText:
The path to the Guardian is blocked by a massive door covered in glowing symbols. Four symbols, scrambled and wrong.

Lumen floats close to examine them. 'I remember this! The symbols tell a story. They need to be in the RIGHT ORDER!'

The symbols show: A SEED, A TREE, A FLOWER, and the SUN.

'What comes first in the story?' Lumen asks. 'Drag them into the right order!'

puzzleInstructions.prompt: Put the symbols in the right order to tell the story of how things grow!
hints: What does a seed need first?
puzzleInstructions.successNarration:
SUN... SEED... FLOWER... TREE! The symbols lock into place and glow golden! 'That's it!' Lumen cheers. The massive door groans and slowly swings open, revealing the final chamber beyond.

And inside... something HUGE begins to move.

outcome.resultText:
You step through the door with Lumen floating beside you.

The final chamber is massive. Ancient. And in the center, rising from its thousand-year sleep...

THE GUARDIAN.

scenes.title: The Guardian Awakens
scenes.narrationText:
The Ancient Guardian rises. Twice as tall as a house. Stone and metal and glowing blue energy. Its eyes lock onto you.

'INTRUDER,' it booms. 'NONE MAY LEAVE THE SHRINE.'

Lumen trembles but stays by your side. 'We can do this! We have to find the weak spot - the core in its chest! But its shields are too strong!'

The Guardian raises its massive arm. You'll have to dodge its attacks and wait for the perfect moment to strike!

'Keep trying!' Lumen shouts. 'When the moment is RIGHT, you'll know!'

failNarrations: The Guardian SLAMS its fist down - you dive left! Dust and stone explode everywhere! 'Keep going!' Lumen shouts.
A beam of energy BLASTS from its eyes - you roll under it just in time! The heat singes your hair! 'Almost!' Lumen yells.
The Guardian STOMPS and the whole room shakes - you jump over the shockwave! 'Its chest is flickering!' Lumen notices.
Giant stone fingers GRAB at you - you slide between them! 'The shields are weakening!' Lumen is glowing brighter!
It ROARS and swings both arms - you sprint up its arm and backflip off! 'NOW! The core is exposed!' Lumen screams.
climaxInstructions.successNarration: THIS IS IT! You LEAP toward the Guardian's chest, Lumen blazing beside you like a comet! Your fist connects with the glowing core - and EVERYTHING EXPLODES IN LIGHT!

characterTurns.promptText: The Guardian attacks! Roll to dodge and find an opening!

outcome.text: THIS IS IT! You LEAP toward the Guardian's chest, Lumen blazing beside you like a comet! Your fist connects with the glowing core - and EVERYTHING EXPLODES IN LIGHT!

ending.title: The Shrine Restored
ending.narrationText:
The light fades. The Guardian is gone - and in its place, the shrine is TRANSFORMED. Flowers bloom from the ancient stone. Sunlight streams through cracks in the ceiling. The whole place feels... alive again.

Lumen floats before you, glowing warm and happy.

'You did it. You actually did it! The shrine is free. I'M free!'

The little spirit nuzzles against your cheek.

'I've been alone for a thousand years. But now... can I come with you? On your next adventure?'

You smile and nod. You have a feeling this is just the beginning.

characterRewards.description: An ancient spirit of light who waited a thousand years for a hero. Now your loyal companion, Lumen can scout ahead and reveal hidden secrets.
